title: Plexify 1.1 Beta & Plexify 1.1 RC
description:
Plexify 1.1 Beta & Plexify 1.1 RC

Plexify is tool that helps you to manage PlexConnect. 

PlexConnect is used to connect your Plex Media Server to your Apple TV 2, 3 without requireing a jailbreak.

If someone asks to describe Plexify in one word it'd be simplicity. 

This simple and yet powerful utility gives you an ability to automatically download PlexConnect from GitHub, generate certificates for your Apple TV and additionally help you to setup your Apple TV. 

Helps you get up and running in under just in a minute. It also comes with a nice, advanced installation method - for those who want to control every simple step. 

In addition, it can also update PlexConnect for you, autostart at startups and not only.

Read more: https://forums.plex.tv/index.php/topic/85156-plexify-os-x-application/

Supported on Mac OS X 10.8/10.9

Source Code: https://github.com/iCyberon/Plexify

So why am I sharing something that is freely available 
here http://cl.ly/0f2V3t243C2W
and 
here http://cl.ly/0V1f3M2x1M26
Well the developerVahagn Mkrtchian seems to be flakey at the moment and no one can predict if and when he will drop those links above, for example Plexify version 1.0 is not available anymore.
